All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Cart
class Cart enables the user to save its chosen items or remove it and its importance When a customer adds items to their cart, the items are associated with that cart, which may be stored in a database or memory.
Item
the class item that will deal with all items that will be showed and can store new item in the database and show all items with common catalog store for each item all its attributes from name and description and brand and ext.
Login
login class to enable the user to log in the system to make the shopping after a successful login, it stores the user in the datavase and can check if the user registered before or not
Main
 
Order
When the customer is ready to check out, the items in their cart are used to create an order.
Registration
the registration class to enable the user to register in the system the successful registration done by unique email wasn't entered before
